mapper.select: select accounts_id from sys_accounts_receivable where 1=1 and status_code!=2 and year = #{year} and month = #{month} and company_id=#{companyId}

SELECT SUM(receivable_accounts_owner) as receivable_accounts_owner,SUM(complete_accounts_owner) as complete_accounts_owner,month from sys_accounts_receivable where 1=1 and status_code!=2
AND company_id IN
#{item}
and year = #{year} GROUP BY `month` ORDER BY `month` asc

SELECT accountsRe.accounts_id,accountsRe.company_id,year,month,receivable_accounts_owner,complete_accounts_owner, complete_house,receivable_house,accountsRe.create_time,accountsRe.status_code, company.company_name AS companyName FROM sys_accounts_receivable AS accountsRe LEFT JOIN sys_company AS company ON accountsRe.company_id = company.company_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND accountsRe.status_code != 2
AND accountsRe.company_id IN
#{item}
and accountsRe.year = #{year} ORDER BY accountsRe.create_time desc

select accounts.*,company.company_name as companyName from sys_accounts_receivable as accounts left JOIN sys_company as company on accounts.company_id=company.company_id where 1=1 and accounts.status_code!=2 and accounts_id = #{accountsId}
select group_concat(distinct month ORDER BY month asc)as monthInfo from sys_accounts_receivable WHERE 1=1 and status_code!=2 and `year`= #{year}
mapper.update: update sys_accounts_receivable set status_code=2 where accounts_id = #{accountsId}
